ref: 8128 pālana n. ʻ protecting, nourishing ʼ Mn., ʻ milk of a recently calved cow ʼ lex. [pāláyati. -- √pr̥ or &rcirclemacr Pa. pālana -- n. ʻ keeping going, living ʼ, ˚nā -- f. ʻ protection ʼ, Aś. pālanaṁ n., ˚nā̆ f., Pk. pālaṇa -- n.; B. pālan ʻ milk of a recently calved cow ʼ; Or. pāḷaṇā̆ ʻ maintaining, saving ʼ; H. lālan -- pālan m. ʻ caressing and cherishing ʼ; M. pāḷaṇ n. ʻ preserving, nourishing ʼ; Ko. pāḷṇẽ, pāḷḷẽ ʻ cradle ʼ; Si. palna ʻ protection ʼ.
